description: Manage deployments, analyze logs, and control Vercel projects
author: Vercel
content: Control Vercel deployments and infrastructure through Claude for seamless deployment management.
features: Analyze deployment logs and build outputs

steps: Add the Vercel server configuration with HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http vercel https://mcp.vercel.com/

security: Use team tokens for shared projects

troubleshooting.issue: Build quota exceeded or deployment fails from quota limits
troubleshooting.solution: Check quota usage at vercel.com/dashboard/usage. Plans have specific build time/memory limits. Upgrade plan for higher quotas. Optimize build scripts to reduce time. Review vercel.com/docs/limits for plan limits.

troubleshooting.issue: Deployment fails with missing environment variables
troubleshooting.solution: Add environment variables in Project Settings > Environment Variables. Set correct environment scope (Production/Preview/Development). Redeploy after adding variables. Check .env.local not committed to git.

troubleshooting.issue: API rate limit errors from third-party services
troubleshooting.solution: Implement rate limiting with Vercel WAF. Use Vercel KV/Redis for rate limit tracking. Check third-party API quotas not exceeded. Add delays between API calls. Use edge functions for caching.

troubleshooting.issue: Authentication failed or insufficient project permissions
troubleshooting.solution: Verify Vercel API token has required scopes. Check team membership and project access in Dashboard. Use team tokens for shared projects. Re-authenticate OAuth connection. Ensure token not expired or revoked.
